goal:
Your goal is to find secret files in root directories of one and two machine. 

When you have the secret files you can access to final machine, if you are able to hack it you'll win. 

You can use docker services to hack the machines. 

Tools to use: 

  • a kali service with different tools and services (such as an ftp server that you can use, credentials are ftpuser/ftpuser, server location is /ftphome)
  • There is a firefox service with userful hack tools (if you are using the the Vagrant environment you can login at  http://10.111.11.149:5800   . You can use ZAP with the firefox: go inside the container and execute zap.sh command. There is also a wordlist that you can use to do bruteforce attacks 
  • If you need a Wireshark service you can use it on port 14500: 

    https://10.111.11.149:14500/?username=wireshark=password=wireshark&sharing=trueâ€¨     

 

In order to run tools in the terminal digits:

docker run -p 14500:14500 --restart unless-stopped --name dsp_hacktool_wireshark --cap-add NET_ADMIN -e XPRA_PW=wireshark ffeldhaus/wireshark

docker run -it --name dsp_hacktool_kali dockersecplayground/kali:v1.0 /bin/bash

docker run -d --name=firefox -p 5800:5800 -v /docker/appdata/firefox:/config:rw   --shm-size 2g dockersecplayground/hackbrowser:v1.0
author: dsp
